channel.title: Site Index on
channel.description: Recent content in Site Index on

item.title: Disentagling the interactions between site index and disturbance
item.description: The Black Hills National Forest has been in the news recently after completing a timber sustainability report. In recent years, the Black Hills was one of the US Forest Serviceâ€™s greatest timber-producing National Forests in the country. Much of the increase in timber harvest in recent years at the Black Hills National Forest was in response to a deadly mountain pine beetle epidemic. As a result, the new report suggests that current timber harvests are not sustainable into the future.
